College Day

The 18-th College Day was celebrated at St. Xaiver’s Catholic College of Engineering recently. Michael Karan Singh, Regional Delivery Head, HCL Services Limited, Bengaluru, participated as chief guest. Bishop of Kuzhithurai Diocese Rev. Fr. V. Jerome Dhas, SDB, presided. College correspondent Rev. Fr. M. Maria William welcomed the gathering. Rev. Fr. Maria Alphonse, Vicar General, Kuzhithurai Diocese, participated. S. Joseph Sekar, Principal oresented the annual report.

Sara Rosso, Women International Onlus, and president, Pair Opportunities Commission, Udine, Italy, was the special guest. Academic achievers were honoured with medals and certificates. Bursar Rev. Fr. P. Benziger proposed the vote of thanks.

Emerging trends

in accounting

The Department of Commerce and Research Centre of Scott Christian College in Nagercoil organised a one-day conference on ‘Emerging trends in finance and accounting’ on Saturday. C. Eugene Franco, Head, Department of Commerce, St. Xavier’s College, Palayamkottai, gave the keynote address. N. Edison, retired Deputy Commissioner of Commercial Tax, gave a talk on budget. Participants from various States took part in the conference and 40 of them presented research papers. Vice-Principal J. Edwin James and former Bursar X. Antony Thanaraj offerred felicitations. Jacqueline Pon Mabel, Head, Department of Commerce and Research Centre, welcomed the gathering.
